ISSUE.TITLE: Bug: Cell copy paste behaviour inconsistent
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Please confirm if bug report does NOT exists already ? - [X] I confirm there is no existing issue for this ### Steps to reproduce ? at times, paste just changes state of the cell to `edit` from `select` mode. https://www.loom.com/share/35cd7792bf1248ca99de08acd1eb5558 ### Desired Behavior copy paste functionality should work for all cells when cell in `select` mode ### Project Details Node: **v16.14.0** Arch: **arm64** Platform: **darwin** Docker: **false** RootDB: **pg** PackageVersion: **0.101.0-beta.0** ### Attachements _No response_
